title: Hormone Balance & Detox Kit
description: Queen of the Thrones® Hormone Balance & Detox Kit helps your colon cleansing, lymphatic drainage and liver detox so that you can support hormone balance. Your kit includes: 1 Organic Castor Oil Pack for Liver, 1 Organic Pelvic Castor Oil Pack, 1 Original Castor Oil Pack for Thyroid & 1 Organic Castor Oil 16.9oz. You save 8%!
